articles.author: Marcus Wratten
articles.title: Red, White & Royal Blue director explains why he doesn't want it called a 'gay' film - PinkNews
articles.description: Red, White & Royal Blue director Matthew López has explained the wonderful reason why the film shouldn’t be described as a "gay" love story.
articles.content:
Red, White & Royal Blue is set to be the queer romance film of the year, but its director, Matthew López, has explained why it shouldnt be described as a gay love story.
Based on the cult queer … [+2782 chars]
